sections.heading: allocation, defined.2021 allocation means a monetary amount of qualified equity investments to be awarded by the Tax Commissioner after the 2021 federal notice under the New Markets Job Growth Investment Act that results in a maximum tax credit utilization in any fiscal year of no more than fifteen
sections.text: allocation, defined.2021 allocation means a monetary amount of qualified equity investments to be awarded by the Tax Commissioner after the 2021 federal notice under the New Markets Job Growth Investment Act that results in a maximum tax credit utilization in any fiscal year of no more than fifteen million dollars of new tax credits.SourceLaws 2021, LB682, ยง 5.
